籤詩版本二:
Akukho mfuneko yakuzikhathaza ngesigulo sangoku kunye nezimangalo.
Kanye njengokuba inkawu ngoku ikhululwe kumatyathanga ayo ibuyela emqolombeni ukuze izule
詩意:
Le hexagram imele umfanekiso wenkawu ekhululwa kumatyathanga ayo.
Yonke into inzima ngaphambi kokuba ibe lula kamva.
解曰: Yahlukanani nezinto. Kwaye ukhululeke. Yiza ngexesha elifanelekileyo. Fumana indlela elungileyo.
籤詩故事一:
◇Xiangzi udibana nondwendwe (uHan Xiangzi udibana noLu Dongbin)
Kwi-Tang Dynasty, uHan Xiangzi wayengumzukulwana kaHan Yu. Unesimo esingafanelekanga kwaye akakwazi ukufunda, ngoko akukho nto anokuyenza ngaphandle kokusela. Wabizwa nguHan Yu ukuba afunde kwisikolo, kodwa endaweni yokuba afunde kakuhle, wangcungcuthekisa abo wayefunda nabo. Kamva, uHan Yu wenza amalungiselelo okuba afundele kwikhaya loonongendi, kodwa umphathi wekhaya loonongendi wakhalaza esithi unekratshi.
Kamva, uLu Dongbin weza kumkhanyisela, yaye ekugqibeleni waba ngongenakufa. Ebizwa ngokuba nguMlawuli uYaohua. Omnye wabaSibhozo abangafiyo. Uphawu lwayo yingobozi yeentyatyambo ephathwa ngesandla.
聖意: Andixolanga ekhaya, ndithandazela ubutyebi namathamsanqa, ukuthengiselana kulindile, umtshato awukagqitywa, uLiujia uthandazela abahambi ngeenyawo ukuba beze emasimini, i-silkworms ininzi, i-Liu ifunyenwe izilwanyana zasekhaya, isimangalo esidlangalaleni. kuthethelelwe, impahla elahlekileyo ikude, isifo alishwa, ingcwaba lase-Anshan lihle
古人: UXiangzi udibana nondwendwe (uHan Xiangzi udibana noLu Dongbin)
